mc.name: Horrifying Revelation
mc.oracleText: Target player discards a card, then puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: Target player discards a card, then puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
"Ours is a glorious transmission! Behold a future where all bow to the Father of Machines."
--Isila, Priest of Sheoldred

mc.name: Phyrexian Crusader
mc.oracleText:
First strike, protection from red and from white
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
mc.printedText:
First strike, protection from red and from white
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

mc.name: Mortarpod
mc.oracleText:
Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +0/+1 and has "Sacrifice this creature: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
Equip {2}
mc.printedText:
Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +0/+1 and has "Sacrifice this creature: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
Equip {2}

mc.name: Steel Sabotage
mc.oracleText: Choose one -- Counter target artifact spell; or return target artifact to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Choose one -- Counter target artifact spell; or return target artifact to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"You are hopelessly obsolete, my brothers. Come and join the Great Work."
--Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

mc.name: Viridian Emissary
mc.oracleText: When Viridian Emissary is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Viridian Emissary is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Titan Forge
mc.oracleText:
{3}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Titan Forge.
{T}, Remove three charge counters from Titan Forge: Put a 9/9 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
{3}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Titan Forge.
{T}, Remove three charge counters from Titan Forge: Put a 9/9 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

mc.name: Inkmoth Nexus
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}: Inkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying and infect until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}: Inkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying and infect until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

mc.name: Fangren Marauder
mc.oracleText: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may gain 5 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may gain 5 life.
mc.flavorText:
"The fangren fight without comfort of any kind. We can ask no less of ourselves."
--Tilien, Sylvok partisan

mc.name: Myr Sire
mc.oracleText: When Myr Sire is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: When Myr Sire is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
mc.flavorText: For the Phyrexians, death is not an end, nor a one-time occurrence.

mc.name: Vivisection
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to cast Vivisection, sacrifice a creature.
Draw three cards.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to cast Vivisection, sacrifice a creature.
Draw three cards.
mc.flavorText: Phyrexians research with the grace of surgeons and the finesse of butchers.

mc.name: Fuel for the Cause
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
mc.printedText: Counter target spell, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
mc.flavorText: "Your ideas will be discarded and your will repurposed."

mc.name: Ichor Wellspring
mc.oracleText: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
mc.printedText: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"Our glorious infection has taken hold."
--Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

mc.name: Silverskin Armor
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is an artifact in addition to its other types.
Equip {2}
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is an artifact in addition to its other types.
Equip {2}
mc.flavorText: Partisan spies warned that no armor would protect the body from Phyrexian infection. Neurok strategists took that as a challenge.

mc.name: Lead the Stampede
mc.oracleText: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
mc.printedText: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

mc.name: Magnetic Mine
mc.oracleText: Whenever another artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Magnetic Mine deals 2 damage to that artifact's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever another artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Magnetic Mine deals 2 damage to that artifact's controller.

mc.name: Piston Sledge
mc.oracleText:
When Piston Sledge enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +3/+1.
Equip--Sacrifice an artifact.
mc.printedText:
When Piston Sledge enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +3/+1.
Equip--Sacrifice an artifact.
mc.flavorText: Only the goblins could make a simple machine so complex.

mc.name: Phyrexian Digester
mc.oracleText: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
mc.printedText: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
mc.flavorText:
"Our cause will ripen in the fertile flesh of the unworthy."
--Sheoldred, Whispering One

mc.name: Pistus Strike
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature with flying. Its controller gets a poison counter.
mc.printedText: Destroy target creature with flying. Its controller gets a poison counter.
mc.flavorText:
"Even a nuisance such as the pistus fly has a purpose in our new world."
--Glissa

mc.name: Rusted Slasher
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice an artifact: Regenerate Rusted Slasher.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice an artifact: Regenerate Rusted Slasher.
mc.flavorText:
"It's a beautiful vision. Discarded debris is reborn as a singular entity."
--Urabrask the Hidden

mc.name: Septic Rats
mc.oracleText:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Whenever Septic Rats attacks, if defending player is poisoned, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Whenever Septic Rats attacks, if defending player is poisoned, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Darksteel Plate
mc.oracleText:
Darksteel Plate is indestructible.
Equipped creature is indestructible.
Equip {2}
mc.printedText:
Darksteel Plate is indestructible.
Equipped creature is indestructible.
Equip {2}
mc.flavorText:
"If there can be no victory, then I will fight forever."
--Koth of the Hammer

mc.name: Vedalken Infuser
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.
mc.flavorText: "All plans begin as dreams. I intend to awaken them."

mc.name: Scourge Servant
mc.oracleText: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
mc.printedText: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
mc.flavorText:
"The union of the oil and necrogen has produced many pleasing reactions."
--Sheoldred, Whispering One

mc.name: Plaguemaw Beast
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
mc.flavorText: Phyrexia's spiral of consumption grows ever wider and darker.

mc.name: Treasure Mage
mc.oracleText: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

mc.name: Neurok Commando
mc.oracleText:
Shroud
Whenever Neurok Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Shroud
Whenever Neurok Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
mc.flavorText: "There's no more time for secluded study. Answers are there only for those with the courage to take them."

mc.name: Quilled Slagwurm
mc.flavorText: Vorinclex removed its teeth so it wouldn't waste time chewing before moving to the next kill.

mc.name: Concussive Bolt
mc.oracleText:
Concussive Bolt deals 4 damage to target player.
Metalcraft -- If you control three or more artifacts, creatures that player controls can't block this turn.
mc.printedText:
Concussive Bolt deals 4 damage to target player.
Metalcraft -- If you control three or more artifacts, creatures that player controls can't block this turn.
mc.flavorText: Shock one, awe the rest.

mc.name: Myr Turbine
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
{T}, Tap five untapped Myr you control: Search your library for a Myr creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
{T}, Tap five untapped Myr you control: Search your library for a Myr creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

mc.oracleText:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
mc.flavorText: A new bird of prey--one that hunts sentience.

mc.oracleText:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Sacrifice a creature: Flesh-Eater Imp gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Sacrifice a creature: Flesh-Eater Imp gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Divine Offering
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
mc.flavorText:
"The Phyrexians are vulnerable. Do not despair. We will prevail!"
--Juryan, rebel leader

mc.name: Loxodon Partisan
mc.oracleText: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
mc.printedText: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
mc.flavorText: "This war is not about loxodon or leonin, Sylvok or Auriok. To defeat these rotters, we must do it together."

mc.name: Quicksilver Geyser
mc.oracleText: Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText:
"Phyrexians are tenacious. That's not the same thing as clever."
--Tezzeret

mc.name: Gnathosaur
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice an artifact: Gnathosaur gains trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice an artifact: Gnathosaur gains trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Mirran creatures that could withstand the Phyrexian oil found an abundance of crunchy snacks.

mc.name: Training Drone
mc.oracleText: Training Drone can't attack or block unless it's equipped.
mc.printedText: Training Drone can't attack or block unless it's equipped.
mc.flavorText:
"Vulshok flail, Viridian shield, loxodon blade . . . Tazzir, bring the Moriok hook and assemble the rookies."
--Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

mc.name: Distant Memories
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a card, exile it, then shuffle your library. Any opponent may have you put that card into your hand. If no player does, you draw three cards.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a card, exile it, then shuffle your library. Any opponent may have you put that card into your hand. If no player does, you draw three cards.
mc.flavorText:
"The fleeting shadows of his primitive self have all but vanished."
--Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

mc.name: Koth's Courier
mc.oracleText: Forestwalk
mc.printedText: Forestwalk
mc.flavorText: Koth sent partisans into the Tangle to bring survivors to the safe haven of the tunnels below Kuldotha.

mc.name: Rally the Forces
mc.oracleText: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Drive them back! Make their underworld into their grave!"
--Koth of the Hammer

mc.name: Gust-Skimmer
mc.oracleText: {U}: Gust-Skimmer gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {U}: Gust-Skimmer gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Phyrexian smog clouds choked the skies, threatening creatures who couldn't comprehend the menace below.

mc.name: Leonin Skyhunter
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: "The infection has spread farther than we could glimpse from the heights of Taj-Nar."

mc.name: Burn the Impure
mc.oracleText: Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has infect, Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
mc.printedText: Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has infect, Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
mc.flavorText: Flame doesn't kneel to Phyrexia.

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
When Viridian Corrupter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
When Viridian Corrupter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Signal Pest can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
mc.printedText:
Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Signal Pest can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
mc.flavorText: It leaps from tree to tree, revealing the enemy's positions.

mc.oracleText:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Rot Wolf this turn is put into a graveyard, you may draw a card.

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Rot Wolf this turn is put into a graveyard, you may draw a card.

mc.oracleText:
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, that creature's controller gains control of Contested War Zone.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, that creature's controller gains control of Contested War Zone.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Sphere of the Suns
mc.oracleText:
Sphere of the Suns enters the battlefield tapped and with three charge counters on it.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Sphere of the Suns: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Sphere of the Suns enters the battlefield tapped and with three charge counters on it.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Sphere of the Suns: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

mc.name: Virulent Wound
mc.oracleText: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. When that creature is put into a graveyard this turn, its controller gets a poison counter.
mc.printedText: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. When that creature is put into a graveyard this turn, its controller gets a poison counter.
mc.flavorText: Sadly, the extent of Gerkk's healing knowledge was "don't pick at it."

mc.name: Unnatural Predation
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Domination by the strongest--that is all that matters in the Tangle now."
--Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

mc.name: Mirran Spy
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may untap target creature.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may untap target creature.
mc.flavorText: Accurate information is a precious commodity in times of war.

mc.name: Serum Raker
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Serum Raker is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each player discards a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Serum Raker is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each player discards a card.
mc.flavorText: The serum from the blinkmoths they gather greases the joints of witch engines.

mc.name: Peace Strider
mc.oracleText: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
mc.printedText: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText:
"The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle."
--Kessla, Sylvok shaman

mc.name: Goblin Wardriver
mc.oracleText: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
mc.printedText: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
mc.flavorText:
"A true warrior fights with whatever's handy."
--Qerk of the Secret Warren

mc.name: Glissa's Courier
mc.oracleText: Mountainwalk
mc.printedText: Mountainwalk
mc.flavorText:
"So, the survivors from Oxid Ridge are on the move. Let them come and witness predation in its purest form."
--Glissa

mc.name: Viridian Claw
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
Equip {1}
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
Equip {1}
mc.flavorText: "Phyrexians can't corrupt what they can't get close enough to touch."

mc.name: Plague Myr
mc.oracleText:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: They watch for a new master, one more sinister than the last.

mc.name: Shriekhorn

Shriekhorn enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Shriekhorn: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText:
Shriekhorn enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Shriekhorn: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

mc.name: Kuldotha Ringleader
mc.oracleText:
Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Kuldotha Ringleader attacks each turn if able.
mc.printedText:
Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Kuldotha Ringleader attacks each turn if able.
mc.flavorText: Being surrounded by goblins is less objectionable when they're fighting for you.

mc.name: Into the Core
mc.oracleText: Exile two target artifacts.
mc.printedText: Exile two target artifacts.
mc.flavorText:
"They believe they're driving us back, but we're leading them to their doom."
--Kethek, furnace stoker

mc.name: Caustic Hound
mc.oracleText: When Caustic Hound is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each player loses 4 life.
mc.printedText: When Caustic Hound is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each player loses 4 life.
mc.flavorText: At first, the Mirrans aimed for its exposed gut. The survivors quickly learned to do otherwise.

mc.name: Strandwalker
mc.oracleText:
Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +2/+4 and has reach.
Equip {4}
mc.printedText:
Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +2/+4 and has reach.
Equip {4}

mc.name: Frantic Salvage
mc.oracleText:
Put any number of target artifact cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Put any number of target artifact cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: "We will mourn when there is time. For now, we survive."

mc.name: Banishment Decree
mc.oracleText: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on top of its owner's library.
mc.printedText: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on top of its owner's library.
mc.flavorText:
"Unworthy of consecration."
--Axsh, lesser cenobite

mc.name: Blisterstick Shaman
mc.oracleText: When Blisterstick Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: When Blisterstick Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: A productive warren requires a good deal of prodding.

mc.name: Ardent Recruit
mc.oracleText: Metalcraft -- Ardent Recruit gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
mc.printedText: Metalcraft -- Ardent Recruit gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
mc.flavorText: "We lost our homes and our kin. We won't let those rotters take our future as well."

mc.name: Ogre Resister
mc.flavorText: He didn't have a word for "home," but he knew it was something to be defended.

mc.name: Melira's Keepers
mc.oracleText: Melira's Keepers can't have counters placed on it.
mc.printedText: Melira's Keepers can't have counters placed on it.
mc.flavorText: Her warriors are the last defense against the coming storm.

mc.name: Phyresis
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
mc.flavorText:
"Perfection is at hand. You have been freed of weakness and made compleat."
--Sheoldred, Whispering One

mc.name: Gore Vassal
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Gore Vassal: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Then if that creature's toughness is 1 or greater, regenerate it.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Gore Vassal: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Then if that creature's toughness is 1 or greater, regenerate it.
mc.flavorText:
"Rid them of their unfaithful organs. Bring new hearts to the unbelievers."
--Tome of Machines, verse 1703

mc.name: Go for the Throat
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
mc.printedText: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
mc.flavorText: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

mc.name: Brass Squire
mc.oracleText: {T}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.
mc.printedText: {T}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.
mc.flavorText:
"I admire it. Few pull off pluck and subservience at the same time."
--Ezuri, renegade leader

mc.name: Spire Serpent
mc.oracleText:
Defender
Metalcraft -- As long as you control three or more artifacts, Spire Serpent gets +2/+2 and can attack as though it didn't have defender.
mc.printedText:
Defender
Metalcraft -- As long as you control three or more artifacts, Spire Serpent gets +2/+2 and can attack as though it didn't have defender.
mc.flavorText: A mirror to draw its eye, a rod to rouse its rage, and a sword to break its bonds.

mc.name: Mirran Crusader
mc.oracleText: Double strike, protection from black and from green
mc.printedText: Double strike, protection from black and from green
mc.flavorText: A symbol of what Mirrodin once was and hope for what it will be again.

mc.name: Phyrexian Rager
mc.oracleText: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
mc.printedText: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
mc.flavorText:
"I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first."
--Sheoldred, Whispering One

mc.name: Copper Carapace
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.flavorText:
"We will fight as they do: our flesh protected behind metal."
--Tae Aquil, Viridan weaponsmith

mc.name: Crush
mc.oracleText: Destroy target noncreature artifact.
mc.printedText: Destroy target noncreature artifact.
mc.flavorText: A golem's hands know no tenderness.

mc.name: Hexplate Golem
mc.flavorText:
"Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap . . . even the ground must join our cause."
--Ezuri, renegade leader

mc.name: Choking Fumes
mc.oracleText: Put a -1/-1 counter on each attacking creature.
mc.printedText: Put a -1/-1 counter on each attacking creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Fall to your knees and welcome our embrace."
--Qal-Sha, Priest of Norn

mc.name: Kuldotha Flamefiend
mc.oracleText: When Kuldotha Flamefiend enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, Kuldotha Flamefiend deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
mc.printedText: When Kuldotha Flamefiend enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, Kuldotha Flamefiend deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

mc.printedText: Gain control of target artifact until end of turn. Untap that artifact. It gains haste until end of turn.

Vigilance

mc.printedText:
Vigilance
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

"May our blessings sever the tongues of the forsaken."

mc.name: Razorfield Rhino

mc.printedText: Metalcraft -- Razorfield Rhino gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
mc.flavorText: Adapted to tread on razorgrass, the rhino proved adept at treading on Phyrexians as well.

mc.name: Nested Ghoul

mc.printedText: Whenever a source deals damage to Nested Ghoul, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
mc.flavorText:
"The chest cavity is cleared of useless meat. I know just what to do with the space."
--Gyed, Vault Priest

mc.printedText: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
mc.flavorText: "I fight for the suns, the surface, and everything in between."

mc.name: Mirran Mettle

Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.printedText:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.printedText: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Let their mindless armies come and face the might of genius."

Haste

mc.oracleText: Destroy all artifacts.
mc.printedText: Destroy all artifacts.
mc.flavorText:
"We will reveal the futility of their heresy by showing them how fragile their relics are."
--Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

mc.name: Victory's Herald
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Victory's Herald attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Victory's Herald attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.

mc.printedText: G

mc.name: Dross Ripper
mc.oracleText: {2}{B}: Dross Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {2}{B}: Dross Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Such a creation serves no purpose other than exterminating every one of us."
--Sadra Alic, Neurok strategist

mc.name: Praetor's Counsel
mc.oracleText: Return all cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Praetor's Counsel. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
mc.printedText: Return all cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Praetor's Counsel. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
mc.flavorText: As the Phyrexian contagion corroded Karn's body, the praetors whispered psalms to corrupt his mind.

mc.name: Knowledge Pool
mc.oracleText:
Imprint -- When Knowledge Pool enters the battlefield, each player exiles the top three cards of his or her library.
Whenever a player casts a spell from his or her hand, that player exiles it. If the player does, he or she may cast another nonland card exiled with Knowledge Pool without paying that card's mana cost.
mc.printedText:
Imprint -- When Knowledge Pool enters the battlefield, each player exiles the top three cards of his or her library.
Whenever a player casts a spell from his or her hand, that player exiles it. If the player does, he or she may cast another nonland card exiled with Knowledge Pool without paying that card's mana cost.

mc.name: Oculus
mc.oracleText: When Oculus is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.
mc.printedText: When Oculus is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"In its gaze I saw no mercy, no recognition that I was worthy to exist."
--Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

mc.name: Cryptoplasm
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Cryptoplasm become a copy of another target creature. If you do, Cryptoplasm gains this ability.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Cryptoplasm become a copy of another target creature. If you do, Cryptoplasm gains this ability.
mc.flavorText:
"If left in the enemy's shape too long, it might be lost to them."
--Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

mc.name: Phyrexian Juggernaut

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Phyrexian Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
mc.printedText:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Phyrexian Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
mc.flavorText: Where nature impedes, Phyrexians overcome.

Flying

mc.printedText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Thopters other than Thopter Assembly, return Thopter Assembly to its owner's hand and put five 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

mc.printedText: {2}{G}: Regenerate Tangle Hulk.

"A true Phyrexian predator. It will never know death, just as nature intended."

mc.name: Shimmer Myr
mc.oracleText:
Flash
You may cast artifact cards as though they had flash.
mc.printedText:
Flash
You may cast artifact cards as though they had flash.

mc.name: Corrupted Conscience

Enchant creature

mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.

Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

mc.name: Phyrexian Rebirth
mc.oracleText: Destroy all creatures, then put an X/X colorless Horror artifact creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures destroyed this way.
mc.printedText: Destroy all creatures, then put an X/X colorless Horror artifact creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures destroyed this way.
mc.flavorText: As long as one drop of the oil exists, the joyous work continues.

mc.name: Bladed Sentinel
mc.oracleText: {W}: Bladed Sentinel gains vigilance until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {W}: Bladed Sentinel gains vigilance until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The Mirran partisans created hundreds of patrol sentinels to divert Phyrexian assaults from the Tangle.

mc.name: Thrun, the Last Troll
mc.oracleText:
Thrun, the Last Troll can't be countered.
Thrun can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
{1}{G}: Regenerate Thrun.
mc.printedText:
Thrun, the Last Troll can't be countered.
Thrun can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
{1}{G}: Regenerate Thrun.
mc.flavorText: His crime was silence, and now he suffers it eternally.

mc.name: Hellkite Igniter
mc.oracleText:
Flying, haste
{1}{R}: Hellkite Igniter gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
mc.printedText:
Flying, haste
{1}{R}: Hellkite Igniter gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
mc.flavorText: Its flight sets the sky itself on fire.

mc.name: Galvanoth
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
mc.flavorText: It chews open Mirrodin's husk and feeds on the outpouring of energy.

mc.name: Slagstorm
mc.oracleText: Choose one -- Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each creature; or Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each player.
mc.printedText: Choose one -- Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each creature; or Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each player.
mc.flavorText:
"As long as we have the will to fight, we are never without weapons."
--Koth of the Hammer

mc.name: Decimator Web

mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Target opponent loses 2 life, gets a poison counter, then puts the top six cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

mc.printedText:
Vigilance
Kemba's Legion can block an additional creature for each Equipment attached to Kemba's Legion.

mc.printedText: Destroy target creature, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

mc.printedText: {2}{U}, {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. You may tap or untap that creature.

mc.name: Tangle Mantis
mc.oracleText: Trample
mc.printedText: Trample
mc.flavorText: The fiercest hunters in the Tangle don't seek out the mantises. They are the mantises.
